fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor

Class SensorSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor.SensorSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentI, SensorI

    public class SensorSimulator
extends AbstractComponent
implements SensorI
    The class SensorSimulator implements an active component of type RNGProducerI offering a random number generation service through a data offered interface RNGDataOfferedI

    Description

    The component uses two RNGProducer components and a component to produces its random numbers by the sum of two random numbers generated by its inner producer components.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 28 janv. 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      stop the sending of sensor data when such a stream was started by a call to the method startPushingData Contract pre true // no precondition.
